name: Airwin Aviator School
about: Airwin Aviator School, located at Tököl Airfield in Budapest, Hungary, is a premier flight training institution specializing in both integrated and modular training. We boast a fully digitalized training platform, utilizing the newest AT Aero-3 aircraft with Glass Cockpit technology, and are fully EASA-accredited. Our training environment includes a busy airport with both paved and grass runways, ensuring students gain confidence in various flight conditions. With a team of experienced and enthusiastic instructors, we provide industry-leading training for both airline and individual pilots. Our state-of-the-art Training Management System ensures seamless and error-free documentation, and our friendly environment facilitates effective teaching and learning. Join us to achieve your pilot dreams with confidence and safety.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
EASA ATPL Ground School"]
